title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Coding cost-efficient multi-tenant knowledge bases w/ time-to-live (TTL)-SAS412
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生存时间(TTL)编写具有成本效益的多租户知识库-SAS412
abstract: This code-focused session demonstrates how to build cost-efficient, multi-tenant knowledge bases using time-to-live (TTL) operations to dramatically reduce infrastructure costs in SaaS environments. We'll live-code a serverless architecture that ingests documents only when needed and automatically expires unused documents, addressing the critical challenge of managing multiple tenants with varying usage patterns. The session will showcase practical implementation of Amazon Bedrock's custom data source with DynamoDB TTL triggers and intelligent document lifecycle management. Define a tiered based approach by implementing the knowledge base with a choice of vector databases, such as OpenSearch and S3 Vectors. We'll also explore broader applications of TTL-driven session management, cache optimization, and tenant resource provisioning.
abstract_cn: 本代码实战课程演示如何使用生存时间（TTL）操作构建成本高效的多租户知识库，以大幅降低 SaaS 环境中的基础设施成本。我们将现场编写一个无服务器架构，仅在需要时摄取文档并自动使文档过期，解决管理具有不同使用模式的多个租户这一关键挑战。本课程将展示 Amazon Bedrock 自定义数据源与 DynamoDB TTL 触发器和智能文档生命周期管理的实际实现。通过选择向量数据库（如 OpenSearch 和 S3 Vectors）实现知识库，定义基于分层的方法。我们还将探讨 TTL 驱动的会话管理、缓存优化和租户资源配置的更广泛应用。
